trans-unit.source: Contains instance information about a single instance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关的单个实例的实例信息<xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: MultiBindingExpression describes a single run-time instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>.
trans-unit.target: MultiBindingExpression 描述一种<xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>。</xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>的单个运行时实例

trans-unit.source: Therefore, it describes a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> objects attached to a single binding target property.
trans-unit.target: 因此，它描述的集合<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression>对象附加到单个绑定目标属性。</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression>

trans-unit.source: For information about binding expressions, see the Binding and BindingExpression section in the [Data Binding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关绑定表达式的信息，请参阅中的绑定和 BindingExpression 部分[数据绑定概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: With the use of a converter, the property values of the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> objects in a MultiBindingExpression produce a final value for the target property.
trans-unit.target: 转换器的属性值使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression>MultiBindingExpression 中的对象生成一个最终值的目标属性。</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression>

trans-unit.source: In the reverse direction, the target property value is translated to a set of values that are fed back into the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> objects.
trans-unit.target: 按反方向，目标属性值转换为一组值反馈到<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>。</xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"></xref> objects in this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBindingExpression"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"></xref>的此实例中的对象<xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBindingExpression"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection of the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 只读集合<xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Even though the return type is a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase"></xref> objects the returned collection would only contain <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"></xref> objects because the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding"></xref> class currently only supports <xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 即使返回类型是一套<xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase"></xref>对象返回的集合将只包含<xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"></xref>对象，因为<xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding"></xref>类当前仅支持<xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether any of the inner <xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref> objects or the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding"></xref> itself has a failing validation rule.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示是否有任何内部<xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref>对象或<xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding"></xref>自身是否存在无效验证规则。

trans-unit.source: You can set validation rules on both the <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> object and the individual <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> objects in the <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以上都设置验证规则<xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>对象和个人<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>中的对象<xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> </xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>

trans-unit.source: The binding engine evaluates the <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding.ValidationRules%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> object when a value moves from the binding target property to the <xref:System.Windows.Data.IMultiValueConverter> object (multi-value converter).
trans-unit.target: 绑定引擎将计算<xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding.ValidationRules%2A>上<xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>对象时的值移到的绑定目标属性从<xref:System.Windows.Data.IMultiValueConverter>对象 （多值转换器）。</xref:System.Windows.Data.IMultiValueConverter> </xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding.ValidationRules%2A>

trans-unit.source: After that, when a value moves from the converter to the binding source property of an individual binding, the binding engine evaluates the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A> on that <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> object.
trans-unit.target: 之后，当从转换器移到单个绑定的绑定源属性的值绑定引擎将计算<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A>上<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if at least one of the inner <xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref> objects or the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding"></xref> itself has a failing validation rule; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果至少一个内部的<xref href="System.Windows.Data.Binding"></xref>对象或<xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding"></xref>自身存在无效的验证规则; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the parent binding has a failed validation rule.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示父绑定是否具有失败的验证规则。

trans-unit.source: This property is identical to the <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBindingExpression.HasError%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性等同于<xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBindingExpression.HasError%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBindingExpression.HasError%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the parent binding has a failed validation rule; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果父绑定具有失败的验证规则;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding"></xref> object from which this <xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBindingExpression"></xref> is created.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding"></xref>中此对象<xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBindingExpression"></xref>创建。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding"></xref> object from which this <xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBindingExpression"></xref> is created.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding"> </xref>中此对象<xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBindingExpression"></xref>创建。

trans-unit.source: Sends the current binding target value to the binding source properties in <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingMode"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingMode"></xref> bindings.
trans-unit.target: 将当前的绑定目标值发送到中的绑定源属性<xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingMode"></xref>或<xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingMode"></xref>绑定。

trans-unit.source: Forces a data transfer from the binding source properties to the binding target property.
trans-unit.target: 强制将数据从绑定源属性传输到绑定目标属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"></xref> object that caused this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBindingExpression"></xref> to be invalid.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"></xref>导致的此实例的对象<xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBindingExpression"></xref>无效。

trans-unit.source: You can set validation rules on both the <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> object and the individual <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> objects in the <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> object.
trans-unit.target: 你可以上都设置验证规则<xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>对象和个人<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>中的对象<xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> </xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>

trans-unit.source: The binding engine evaluates the <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding.ValidationRules%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> object when a value moves from the binding target property to the <xref:System.Windows.Data.IMultiValueConverter> object (multi-value converter).
trans-unit.target: 绑定引擎将计算<xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding.ValidationRules%2A>上<xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>对象时的值移到的绑定目标属性从<xref:System.Windows.Data.IMultiValueConverter>对象 （多值转换器）。</xref:System.Windows.Data.IMultiValueConverter> </xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding.ValidationRules%2A>

trans-unit.source: After that, when a value moves from the converter to the binding source property of an individual binding, the binding engine evaluates the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A> on that <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> object.
trans-unit.target: 之后，当从转换器移到单个绑定的绑定源属性的值绑定引擎将计算<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A>上<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> </xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.ValidationRules%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"></xref> object that caused this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBindingExpression"></xref> to be invalid.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"> </xref>导致的此实例的对象<xref href="System.Windows.Data.MultiBindingExpression"></xref>无效。
